content: of r1-r8 8 slip_stitch then in other side of starting chain from r1 28 single_crochet then in other rough side of r1-r8 8 slip_stitch slip_stitch to 1st st leave very long tail for sewing cut yarn invisible finish r9 insert a stitch marker into each stitch indicated by * label as plate f for assembly 56 15 underbody x1 size g / 4 25 mm hook underbody color # of row stitches 6 single_crochet in magic_ring slip_stitch to 1st st chain 1 do not work into the connecting slip_stitch in the following row these connecting slsts do not count in stitch count the first st in each following row should be worked in the same stitch space in which you r1 worked the connecting slip_stitch of the previous row 6 1 single_crochet 1 triple single_crochet increase x 3 slip_stitch to 1st st chain 1 r2 note do not confuse a triple single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet in the same stitch space with a treble_crochet triple crochet 12 r3 single_crochet around slip_stitch to 1st st
